name: Short Rest (nsuperrata)
description:
You have been fighting monsters and exploring dungeons, now its time to stop for a -short rest-. Take a nap, sell and buy items, upgrade your equipment and stare at a bonfire.

You control a classic JRPG-like party that have to stop to rest at a camp between exploring dungeons, fighting monsters and saving kingdoms. 

Controls:

Z-select, interact, talk

X-menu

C-go back

Credits:

Famicase author: Daniel Gil @ChubsyUnicorn

Original Music and Sound Effects: Liz Martin

Some sprites assets: from The Mighty Pack by The Mighty Palm

Developed for the A Game By Its Cover 2021

Project unfinished, still working on it.
